text: Nerkku Nere is a 2004 Indian Malayalam film, directed by PN Menon, starring Nedumudi Venu and Kalpana in the lead role. http://www.filmibeat.com/malayalam/movies/nerku-nere.html This was the last film of PN Menon. ==Cast== * Nedumudi Venu * Kalpana * Mohan Ayiroor * Mallika * Syam seethal * Oduvil Unnikrishnan * Ramu Mangalappally * Shobha Mohan ==References== ==External links== * Category:2004 films Category:Indian films Category:2000s Malayalam-language films
title: Nerkku Nere
